texts.name: Melisa
texts.biography: Anastasia used to be a high level druid in Avlee, she never participate in any battle for elves. However, she still be framed as a betrayer and was deported from Avlee. Until now, she still do not know what the justice is.

specialty.description: Casts Fire Shield with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit.
